name: 林家薇
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
Week	Content
1	Orientation
2-3	Unit 1 Getting to know you
4-5	Unit 2 The way we live
7-8	Unit 3 What happened next?
9	Midterm exam and Proficiency Test
10-11	Unit 4 The marketplace
12-13	Unit 5 What do you want to do?
14-15	Unit 6 Places and Things 
16-17	Review
18	Final Exam and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
期中考_聽力與口說 	30%  
期末考_筆試  		30%  	
平時成績			40%
